text.textblock: In accordance with the Federal Advisory Committee Act (Pub. L. 92-463, as amended), the National Science Foundation announces the following meeting:
Committee on Equal Opportunities in Science and Engineering (CEOSE) (1173).
January 27, 1994; 8:30 a.m.-5:30 p.m. (Open); January 28, 1994; 8 a.m.-12 Noon (Open).
Rooms 375 and 380, National Science Foundation, 4201 Wilson Boulevard, Arlington, VA 22230.
Wanda E. Ward, Executive Secretary, CEOSE, National Science Foundation, 4201 Wilson Boulevard, room 815, Arlington, VA 22230. Telephone (703) 306-1633.
May be obtained from the Executive Secretary at the above address.
To plan broader CEOSE participation in the federal sector and to review issues about and assessments of participation rates of all segments of society in science and engineering.

January 27: 8:30 a.m. to 12:15 p.m., rm. 375_Discussion of broader CEOSE participation in the federal sector; 12:15 p.m. to 5:30 p.m., rm. 380_Review of assessments of participation rates of all segments of society in science and engineering; January 28: 8 a.m. to 12 Noon, rm. 375_Discussion of issues about the participation rates of all segments of society in science and engineering, directions.
Delay due to difficulty in identifying desired presenters for scheduled meeting date.

doctitle.textblock: Committee on Equal Opportunity in Science and Engineering; Meeting
